docs.snippet: A Saudi prisoner at Guantanamo who waged a hunger strike for years to protest his confinement has been released from the U.S. base at Cuba, the Pentagon said Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Saudi prisoner at Guantanamo who waged a hunger strike for years to protest his confinement has been released from the U.S. base at Cuba, the Pentagon said Tuesday.

headline.main: US Frees Saudi Who Waged Long Hunger Strike at Guantanamo
headline.print_headline: US Frees Saudi Who Waged Long Hunger Strike at Guantanamo

docs.snippet: A woman in a head scarf gazes piercingly from the side of a Brooklyn brownstone. A flock of spray-painted birds breaks free from shackles on a Manhattan building. A Harlem mural shows a giant teal gazelle against a black background, barren trees a...
docs.lead_paragraph: A woman in a head scarf gazes piercingly from the side of a Brooklyn brownstone. A flock of spray-painted birds breaks free from shackles on a Manhattan building. A Harlem mural shows a giant teal gazelle against a black background, barren trees and a peacock feather.

headline.main: NYC Street Art Makes Statement for Human Rights in Iran
headline.print_headline: NYC Street Art Makes Statement for Human Rights in Iran

docs.snippet: The retired tennis star, who was dragged to the ground on Sept. 9, said the mayor was “on the same page as us” on increasing police accountability....
docs.lead_paragraph: The retired tennis star, who was dragged to the ground on Sept. 9, said the mayor was “on the same page as us” on increasing police accountability.
docs.abstract: James Blake, tennis star who was tackled and mistakenly arrested by plainclothes cop James Frascatore in Midtown Manhattan, meets with New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio and Police Commissioner William J Bratton to discuss police accountability; praises mayor's dedication to department reform during news conference afterwards.

headline.main: James Blake Praises Mayor de Blasio After Meeting on Mistaken Arrest
headline.print_headline: Tennis Star Tackled in Mistaken Arrest Praises Mayor After Meeting

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: Frascatore, James (New York, NY, Police Officer)

byline.original: By BENJAMIN MUELLER and AL BAKER

docs.snippet: This deadpan drama by the shock artist Thomas Bradshaw is more of a slice-of-life narrative than his previous ventures into new frontiers of outrage....
docs.lead_paragraph: This deadpan drama by the shock artist Thomas Bradshaw is more of a slice-of-life narrative than his previous ventures into new frontiers of outrage.
docs.abstract: Ben Brantley reviews Thomas Bradshaw play Fulfillment, directed by Ethan McSweeny and starring Gbenga Akinnagbe, at Flea Theater.

headline.main: Review: Thomas Bradshaw’s ‘Fulfillment,’ on One Man’s Ceiling, and His Frustrations

docs.snippet: A ban on sleeping outside City Hall at night reflects the city’s divided response to a problem that its mayor blames partly on its reputation for hospitality....
docs.lead_paragraph: A ban on sleeping outside City Hall at night reflects the city’s divided response to a problem that its mayor blames partly on its reputation for hospitality.
docs.abstract: Madison, Wis, is experiencing surge in homeless people, issue that prompted Democratic Mayor Paul Soglin to pass legislation banning anyone from sleeping outside City Hall starting October 1; Soglin rests some of blame on state capital's liberal reputation.

headline.main: Surge in Homelessness Tests Wisconsin Capital’s Welcoming Spirit
headline.print_headline: Surge in Homelessness Tests Wisconsin Capital’s Welcoming Spirit

docs.snippet: Since the start of the weekend, about 27,000 migrants have entered reception centers and camps where they have received food, housing and health care before they move on to Germany....
docs.lead_paragraph: Since the start of the weekend, about 27,000 migrants have entered reception centers and camps where they have received food, housing and health care before they move on to Germany.
docs.abstract: Austria assumes lead in efforts to process migrants from Middle East, as quarreling Eastern European countries tighten their borders, and rest of continent falters in addressing crisis; refugees are elated by Austria's acceptance in contrast to other less welcoming environments.

headline.main: Austria Takes Role of Distribution Center for Germany-Bound Migrants
headline.print_headline: Austria Takes Role of Distribution Center for Germany-Bound Migrants
